id.description: The ID of the user or group. Valid values between `0` and `2147483647`

storageCapacityQuotaGib.description: The amount of storage that the user or group can use in gibibytes (GiB). Valid values between `0` and `2147483647`

type.description: A value that specifies whether the quota applies to a user or group. Valid values are `USER` or `GROUP`.
